law.catch_line: Distribution of ballots, canvass, and declaration of result.
law.text: The Commissioner of Agriculture shall prepare and distribute in advance of the referendum all necessary ballots and shall arrange for the necessary poll holders for conducting the referendum. Following the referendum and within ten (10) days thereafter, the Commissioner shall canvass and publicly declare the result of the referendum.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 223, sec. 11, effective July 13, 1990.
